attributes.action: I would like the petition on a second EU referendum dismissed
attributes.additional_details: I was asked to sign a petition to have the EU referendum held again as it was not a 60% majority. This is wrong. The country has spoken and we should abide by the original outcome .
attributes.background: The EU referendum  was done legally and democratically  a petition to have a second referendum for the same thing is wrong and the original result should stand.
